API_Description: Changes the current page number and selects the specified word on the page.

nPage.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the page to operate on. The default is 0, the first page in the document.

nWord.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the word to obtain. The default is 0, the first word on the page.

bScroll.description: (optional) Specifies whether to scroll the selected word into the view if it is not already viewable. The default is true.
